imdb.plot outline: A weekly spin-off of the long-running entertainment news magazine, "Extra", produced in conjunction with Essence Magazine and Essence.com. The web series, hosted by Nischelle Turner, reports on Hollywood news, music, style and health as it relates to the African-American community.
imdb.title: Extra on Essence
